text: The "Lithuania national futsal team" represents Lithuania in international futsal. They qualified for the FIFA Futsal World Cup in 2021 when they were hosts and have also qualified for the UEFA Futsal Championship in 2026. ==Competitive record== ===FIFA Futsal World Cup=== FIFA
